name: RafflesiaWeb
tagline: The new modern UI / modern Web Browser.Created for everyone including for the nature lovers.
body:
### Welcome to RafflesiaWeb. The new modern UI / modern Web Browser.Created for everyone including for the nature lovers.Powered to you by Myh Yazid.The RafflesiaWeb is a web browser that uses modern technology like [WebKit](http://www.webkit.org/) and many more.We have created two version of RafflesiaWeb :
1. for users
2. for web developers(coming soon)
You can give a try now by download it on this repo. ### Versions available We've created the first version that is only available for Windows at this time.But for other OS's don't worry we will work out to create the another variant of the RafflesiaWeb.So stay tuned!! ### The Team Oh,The Team Involved?? I'm the one who only developed the RafflesiaWeb with the special help from my ICT teacher and with the help from Google/Chromium Community.While on the same time,I will developed the second version for the web developers...special only for the web developers..for this version we would like to thanks to the mozilla team for the great tutorial and help at their dev sites. ### What are the status of RafflesiaWeb Now? The RafflesiaWeb now is still on but I need a little time to make sure it works correctly before we can publish it. ### Support or Contact Having trouble with RafflesiaWeb? Check out the Support Page or contact me at [rafflesiaweb@outlook.com](mailto:rafflesiaweb@outlook.com) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
